title: IPNetMonitorX 2.7.2 – Tools help monitor your Internet connection

title: Stripes 1.7 – Minimalistic RSS reader
content: Stripes is a minimalistic RSS reader created to help you enjoy your daily news.   Read, share, star and search your favorite feeds by using clean and intuitive interface.   Supports formats: RSS RDF Atom   Version 1.7: Bug fix   OS X 10.11 or later, 64-bit processor

title: MusicExtractor 1.0 – Extract the audio track from common video formats
